entry.source: 〉 A horde of demons are stationed by{F801}the river.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 A horde of demons are stationed by{F801}the river.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 One of the demons stepped out from{F801}the crowd.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 One of the demons stepped out from{F801}the crowd.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-240}{F813,0,79001}That goddamn Peallaidh! How dare he{F801}drive us out of Ueno!{F801}{F802}{F813,0,79002}What I wouldn't give for his head!{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-240}{F813,0,79001}That goddamn Peallaidh! How dare he{F801}drive us out of Ueno!{F801}{F802}{F813,0,79002}What I wouldn't give for his head!{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-240}{F813,0,79003}Excuse me... You, the human over there.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,79004}If you bring us Peallaidh's head,{F801}we might be of assistance to you.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-240}{F813,0,79003}Excuse me... You, the human over there.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,79004}If you bring us Peallaidh's head,{F801}we might be of assistance to you.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 A horde of demons are stationed by{F801}the river.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 A horde of demons are stationed by{F801}the river.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 One of the demons stepped out from{F801}the crowd.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 One of the demons stepped out from{F801}the crowd.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-240}{F813,0,79006}If you bring us Peallaidh's head,{F801}we might be of assistance to you.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-240}{F813,0,79006}If you bring us Peallaidh's head,{F801}we might be of assistance to you.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 A horde of demons are stationed by{F801}the river.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 A horde of demons are stationed by{F801}the river.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 One of the demons stepped out from{F801}the crowd.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 One of the demons stepped out from{F801}the crowd.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-240}{F813,0,79007}Oh, that head you have... You've{F801}done it! You killed Peallaidh!{F801}{F802}{F813,0,79008}Thank you. Now we can go back to{F801}Shinobazu Pond.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-240}{F813,0,79007}Oh, that head you have... You've{F801}done it! You killed Peallaidh!{F801}{F802}{F813,0,79008}Thank you. Now we can go back to{F801}Shinobazu Pond.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-240}{F813,0,79009}...Ah, sorry, maybe you hadn't heard.{F801}It was that Peallaidh who drove us{F801}out of Shinobazu Pond.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-240}{F813,0,79009}...Ah, sorry, maybe you hadn't heard.{F801}It was that Peallaidh who drove us{F801}out of Shinobazu Pond.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-240}{F813,0,79010}Come now and please hand his filthy{F801}head over to us.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-240}{F813,0,79010}Come now and please hand his filthy{F801}head over to us.{F801}

entry.source: Hand it over{F801}Keep it to yourself{F801}
entry.target: Hand it over{F801}Keep it to yourself{F801}

entry.source: 〉 {F843,0} handed over{F801}Peallaidh's head.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 {F843,0} handed over{F801}Peallaidh's head.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,5}{F813,0,79011}With pleasure... Its stench has been{F801}unbearable this entire time.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,5}{F813,0,79011}With pleasure... Its stench has been{F801}unbearable this entire time.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-240}{F813,0,79012}This is Peallaidh's head all right.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,79013}*chuckle* What a pitiful sight you are.{F801}Don't you agree, you bully...!?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-240}{F813,0,79012}This is Peallaidh's head all right.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,79013}*chuckle* What a pitiful sight you are.{F801}Don't you agree, you bully...!?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-240}{F813,0,79014}Hey, guys! Feel free to do whatever{F801}you want with this.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-240}{F813,0,79014}Hey, guys! Feel free to do whatever{F801}you want with this.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 The demon threw Peallaidh's head into{F801}the river.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 The demon threw Peallaidh's head into{F801}the river.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 The horde of demons swarmed to the{F801}head, chewing on it like hungry fish.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 The horde of demons swarmed to the{F801}head, chewing on it like hungry fish.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-240}{F813,0,79015}You've done us a genuine favor...{F801}Please let us return it.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-240}{F813,0,79015}You've done us a genuine favor...{F801}Please let us return it.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 {F843,0} told the demon that he{F801}wished to cross the river.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 {F843,0} told the demon that he{F801}wished to cross the river.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-240}{F813,0,79016}That won't be difficult. We'll act{F801}as a bridge for you.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,79017}Would you like to cross over now?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-240}{F813,0,79016}That won't be difficult. We'll act{F801}as a bridge for you.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,79017}Would you like to cross over now?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-240}{F813,0,79018}Hey guys, it's Formation B time.{F801}We're going with B!{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-240}{F813,0,79018}Hey guys, it's Formation B time.{F801}We're going with B!{F801}

entry.source: 〉 The demons began to form a line,{F801}creating a bridge to the far shore.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 The demons began to form a line,{F801}creating a bridge to the far shore.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-240}{F813,0,79019}We owe our lives to you. We'll gladly{F801}act as your bridge whenever you need.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-240}{F813,0,79019}We owe our lives to you. We'll gladly{F801}act as your bridge whenever you need.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 A horde of demons are stationed by{F801}the river.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 A horde of demons are stationed by{F801}the river.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 One of the demons stepped out from{F801}the crowd.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 One of the demons stepped out from{F801}the crowd.{F801}

entry.source: {F813,0,79020}{F812}Demon\0{F87A,-240}Ah, it's you. We've been waiting.{F801}
entry.target: {F813,0,79020}{F812}Demon\0{F87A,-240}Ah, it's you. We've been waiting.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-240}{F813,0,79021}Come now and please hand his filthy{F801}head over to us.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-240}{F813,0,79021}Come now and please hand his filthy{F801}head over to us.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 A horde of demons are stationed by{F801}the river.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 A horde of demons are stationed by{F801}the river.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 One of the demons stepped out from{F801}the crowd.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 One of the demons stepped out from{F801}the crowd.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-240}{F813,0,79022}Ah, it's you. Would you like to{F801}cross the river?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-240}{F813,0,79022}Ah, it's you. Would you like to{F801}cross the river?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hunter\0{F87A,67}{F813,0,79023}Hehehe... I'll let you cross the river.{F801}And the Ashura-kai doesn't have to{F801}know...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,79024}Or at least that was the plan...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,79025}But there aren't any open boats right{F801}now, what with the big group of{F801}customers going to Ikebukuro.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,79026}Sorry about that. You'll have to go{F801}kill some time somewhere.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Hunter\0{F87A,67}{F813,0,79023}Hehehe... I'll let you cross the river.{F801}And the Ashura-kai doesn't have to{F801}know...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,79024}Or at least that was the plan...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,79025}But there aren't any open boats right{F801}now, what with the big group of{F801}customers going to Ikebukuro.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,79026}Sorry about that. You'll have to go{F801}kill some time somewhere.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hunter\0{F87A,67}{F813,0,79027}Hehehe... I'll let you cross the river.{F801}And the Ashura-kai doesn't have to{F801}know...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,79028}You want to head to Shinjuku?{F801}That'll cost you 500 Macca.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Hunter\0{F87A,67}{F813,0,79027}Hehehe... I'll let you cross the river.{F801}And the Ashura-kai doesn't have to{F801}know...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,79028}You want to head to Shinjuku?{F801}That'll cost you 500 Macca.{F801}

entry.source: Cross the river{F801}Don't cross{F801}
entry.target: Cross the river{F801}Don't cross{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hunter\0{F87A,67}{F813,0,79029}Hehehe... Thanks for the business.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Hunter\0{F87A,67}{F813,0,79029}Hehehe... Thanks for the business.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hunter\0{F87A,67}{F813,0,79030}Then come back when you want to{F801}cross the river.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Hunter\0{F87A,67}{F813,0,79030}Then come back when you want to{F801}cross the river.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hunter\0{F87A,67}{F813,0,79031}Hey, you don't have the money{F801}for that!{F801}{F802}{F813,0,79032}Go raise some Macca somewhere and{F801}come back.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Hunter\0{F87A,67}{F813,0,79031}Hey, you don't have the money{F801}for that!{F801}{F802}{F813,0,79032}Go raise some Macca somewhere and{F801}come back.{F801}

entry.source: Cross the river{F801}Not yet{F801}
entry.target: Cross the river{F801}Not yet{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-240}{F813,0,79033}I wouldn't think you had any use for{F801}it, though...{F801}{F802}{F812}Demon\0{F87A,-240}{F813,0,79034}We understand.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-240}{F813,0,79033}I wouldn't think you had any use for{F801}it, though...{F801}{F802}{F812}Demon\0{F87A,-240}{F813,0,79034}We understand.{F801}

entry.target: {F812}Hunter\0{F87A,67}{F813,0,404331}Hehehe... I'll let you cross the river.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,79028}You want to head to Shinjuku?{F801}That'll cost you 500 Macca.{F801}
